Package dbproject.client

Class ClientConnection

java.lang.Object
dbproject.networking.SocketConnection
dbproject.client.ClientConnection
public class ClientConnection extends SocketConnection
Uses the Protocol to communicate with a server using the framework of SocketConnection.

    ClientConnection(InetAddress host, int port, Client client)
    Start a connection with a server.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientConnection

      public ClientConnection(InetAddress host, int port, Client client) throws IOException
      Start a connection with a server.
      Parameters:
      host - InetAddress to connect to
      port - Port to connect to
      client - Client to pass messages to
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs with the connection

  • Method Details

    • close

      public void close()
      Close the network connection. This will also cause the thread that receives messages to stop.
      Overrides:
      close in class SocketConnection

    • handleMessage

      protected void handleMessage(String message)
      Handles a message received from the connection. If the message adheres to the protocol, calls the appropriate handler method in the Client.
      Specified by:
      handleMessage in class SocketConnection
      Parameters:
      message - the message received from the connection

    • handleDisconnect

      protected void handleDisconnect()
      Handles a disconnect from the connection, i.e., when the connection is closed.
      Specified by:
      handleDisconnect in class SocketConnection

    • sendHello

      public void sendHello(String clientDescription)
      Sends a hello message to the server. Passes a description that may not include the argument separator of the protocol.
      Parameters:
      clientDescription - A description to include with the message

    • sendLogin

      public void sendLogin(String username)
      Sends a login message to the server. Passes a username that may not include the argument separator of the protocol.
      Parameters:
      username - username to include

    • sendList

      public void sendList()
      Sends a request for a list of all connected users.

    • sendQueue

      public void sendQueue()
      Sends a request to enter or exit the queue.

    • sendMove

      public void sendMove(int location)
      Sends a move. Passes a location. Does not validate the location.
      Parameters:
      location - A location for the move
